estimatedFlightDuration.description: The estimated time the flight will take.

seller.description: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.

flightNumber.description: The unique identifier for a flight including the airline IATA code. For example, if describing United flight 110, where the IATA code for United is 'UA', the flightNumber is 'UA110'.

departureGate.description: Identifier of the flight's departure gate.

departureAirport.description: The airport where the flight originates.

arrivalGate.description: Identifier of the flight's arrival gate.

arrivalAirport.description: The airport where the flight terminates.

mealService.description: Description of the meals that will be provided or available for purchase.

departureTerminal.description: Identifier of the flight's departure terminal.

arrivalTerminal.description: Identifier of the flight's arrival terminal.

webCheckinTime.description: The time when a passenger can check into the flight online.

boardingPolicy.description: The type of boarding policy used by the airline (e.g. zone-based or group-based).
